#summary How to install the package
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Installing the package =

The JAR files under the lib/endorsed/ folder need to be copied under your environment's endorsed libraries folder. If you are running a web application under Apache Tomcat, this directory can be found at:
{{{
JAVA_HOME/lib/endorsed
}}}
or
{{{
CATALINA_HOME/common/endorsed
}}}

For other application servers or environments, please consult their documentation for configuring endorsed libraries.

To make the library available to the web application the following
need to be done:

  * Copy lib/`*`.jar and java-openid-sxip-`*`.jar to your application's Java classpath

_For [http://maven.apache.org/ maven2] users: [MavenHowTo]_
